message: My turn.  I'm feeling generous, but inflation is a real concern.
This is a fair deal considering the time pressure and inflation working against us.
Inflation is hitting you harder, be reasonable!
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Take it or leave it.
Your 50/50 split was in round 1, not now!
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. It gives you a slight advantage, but avoids us both walking away with nothing.
You're running out of time, not me. Inflation is on my side.
